translations.en_us: Often, daisy or chamomile (from a botanical point of view, mistakenly) is called plant species of other genera of the Astrov family. Chamomile got its name from the combination of words: low and apple, which personifies the low apple tree due to the characteristic smell of the flower.
translations.ru_ru: Часто ромашкой (с ботанической точки зрения ошибочно) называют виды растений других родов семейства Астровые. Ромашка получило своё название в честь соединений слов: низкий и яблоко, что олицетворяет низкую яблоню из-за характерного запаха цветка.

description.default: Often, daisy or chamomile (from a botanical point of view, mistakenly) is called plant species of other genera of the Astrov family. Chamomile got its name from the combination of words: low and apple, which personifies the low apple tree due to the characteristic smell of the flower.
